Contact.description: The contact information related to the quote.

Date.description: The date of the quote creation.

ExpiryDate.description: The expiry date of the quote.

Status.description: The current status of the quote.

LineAmountTypes.description: The type of line amount used in the quote calculation.

LineItems.description: The individual line items included in the quote.

SubTotal.description: The subtotal amount of the quote.

TotalTax.description: The total tax amount included in the quote.

Total.description: The total amount of the quote including all charges.

TotalDiscount.description: The total discount amount applied to the quote.

UpdatedDateUTC.description: The date and time when the quote was last updated.

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code used for the quote.

CurrencyRate.description: The exchange rate applied to the quote currency.

QuoteID.description: The unique identifier for the quote.

QuoteNumber.description: The unique number assigned to the quote.

Reference.description: Any reference information associated with the quote.

BrandingThemeID.description: The unique identifier for the branding theme associated with the quote.

Title.description: The title or subject of the quote.

Summary.description: A summary or notes related to the quote.

Terms.description: The payment terms specified for the quote.

TrackingCategory.description: The tracking category associated with the quote.
